/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban architecture and greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. Cars and buses are seen in motion, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue sky and the various hues of the buildings.
